subsection.name: Instructions
subsection.p: When upgrading from an older version of the Robots.txt plugin, you have to update the dependencies of your project's cms and site modules to the new plugin version.

Your previous robotstxt related HST configuration may have involved embedding a JSP file and setting up a hst:page and a hst:template. With the latest version of the plug-in, this is no longer necessary. After upgrading, you may want to make sure that your sitemap item points to the hst:default/hst:pages/robotstxt page, and subsequently remove your old hst:pages and hst:templates configuration, as well as the old jsp file, unless you made project-specific adjustments.
